data.eml:eml: New taxa of terrestrial molluscs from Turkey (Gastropoda, Pristilomatidae, Enidae, Hygromiidae, Helicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guemues, Burcin Askim, Neubert, Eike (2012): New taxa of terrestrial molluscs from Turkey (Gastropoda, Pristilomatidae, Enidae, Hygromiidae, Helicidae). ZooKeys 171: 17-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.171.2273, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.171.2273
